body.name: Big and Tall Office Chair for Heavy People 400lb, Executive Desk Computer Chair Adjustable Flip-up Armrests, PU Leather Swivel Task Chair with Ergonomic High Back and Lumbar Support
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 9 mins
features: 🧙🏼【BEST FOR BIG AND TALL】 Office chairs for heavy people offer broader seat and backs. The wide seat measures 21.7"(W)*22.5"(D). This executive office chair uses a reinforced wood frame structure, BIMFA certified gas lift and heavy-duty nylon base and rolling casters, load-bearing capacity is up to 400 lbs.

🧙🏼【LUXURY LOOK OF LEATHER】Famsingo desk chair is upholstered breathable PU leather material that will let you skin breathe at all times. Leather office chairis waterproof and resistant stains, easy to wipe clean. Upscale looks makes the computer chair perfect addition to any office.

🧙🏼【ERGONOMIC DESIGN】Thickened headrest and segmented padded high backrest fit to the curve of human spine can provide strong support and help you release back and lumbar pressure. Sunken surrounded seat and waterfall seat edge can keep you away from the numbness caused by long hours sitting.

🧙🏼【FULLY ADJUSTABLE】Tilt-tension mechanism and gas lift allows to adjust height, seat tilt and tilt tension. Backrest can be recline up to 120°. Lift the flip-up armrest and push in the ergonomic office chair for space saving when not in use.
🧙🏼【FLIP-UP ARMRESTS 】The Big and Tall Office Chair's flip-up armrests give greater freedom and flexibility and can be adjusted to suit your needs, making it easier for you to switch between tasks.

🧙🏼【ASSEMBLE & SERVICE】Big and tall office chair comes with all hardware & necessary tools. Follow the instruction, easy to assemble in estimated about 20-30mins. Famsigo customer service team will provide you with 100% satisfactory service within 24 hours. Besides, heavy duty office chair are also backed by a 1-year warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Description This big and tall office chair is made of high quality PU leather, BIFMA certified padded armrests, gas lift and thick seat. Product Dimension: Dimension: 22.5" L X 27.2" W X 45.5" H Back Size: 20.5" W*28.5" D Seat Size: 21.7" W*22.5" D Seat Adjustable Height: 20.2”-23.9” H Whole Chair Height Adjustable: 45.5" to 49.2" H Maximum Weight: 400 LB The ergonomic executive office chair was designed for your comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to the new office
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired the Executive Desk Computer Chair, and I must say it has completely revolutionized my home office experience. This chair is the epitome of comfort, style, and ergonomic excellence. I am thrilled with my purchase and wholeheartedly give it a well-deserved five-star rating!First and foremost, the comfort level of this chair is unparalleled. The plush cushioning and high-quality upholstery provide exceptional support and a luxurious feel. Whether I'm sitting for a short period or an extended work session, the chair molds to my body, providing optimal comfort and reducing any discomfort or strain. The contoured backrest offers excellent lumbar support, promoting proper posture and preventing backaches.The ergonomic design of the Executive Desk Computer Chair is truly remarkable. The adjustable features allow me to customize the chair to fit my body perfectly. With a convenient lever, I can easily adjust the seat height to ensure my feet are firmly planted on the floor, maintaining a healthy sitting position. The tilt mechanism and reclining function provide a range of options for relaxation and varied sitting positions throughout the day.One aspect that sets this chair apart is its superior build quality. The sturdy construction and durable materials inspire confidence in its longevity. The chair's smooth-rolling casters glide effortlessly across various flooring surfaces, allowing for easy maneuverability. The solid base and frame provide stability and support, ensuring a safe and secure seating experience.The Executive Desk Computer Chair also boasts a sleek and professional design. The stylish aesthetics add a touch of elegance to my home office, elevating its overall ambiance. The attention to detail, such as the polished chrome accents and meticulous stitching, further enhances the chair's visual appeal.Assembly was a breeze, thanks to the clear and straightforward instructions provided. Within a short time, I had the chair fully assembled and ready for use.The customer service provided by the company has been exceptional. They were responsive, knowledgeable, and ensured that all my queries were addressed promptly. Their commitment to customer satisfaction is truly commendable.In conclusion, the Executive Desk Computer Chair is an exceptional investment for anyone seeking the perfect balance of comfort, style, and ergonomic support. It has transformed my home office into a haven of productivity and relaxation. I wholeheartedly recommend this chair to anyone in search of a premium seating solution that surpasses expectations.Five stars without hesitation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Office chair with prime comfort.
reviews.reviewText: This chair is a dream to sit in for extended periods. The padding and ergonomic design provide excellent lumbar support, making long work hours a breeze. It feels robust and reliable, promising longevity in a busy office environment.The chair's adjustable armrests, height, and reclining options offer personalized comfort. It's a fantastic choice for anyone seeking an ergonomic solution to alleviate back strain.Sleek and professional, the chair's design seamlessly fits into any office setting. Its adjustable features cater to different body types, promoting a customizable experience.Overall, this office chair excels in comfort, durability, design, and ergonomics. It's a solid investment for anyone prioritizing both style and functionality in their workspace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, Beautiful chair
reviews.reviewText: I bought this chair for my husband. It looks beautiful and grand, and it is very comfortable and supportive to sit on. Good for back, leg, and hip pain. Looks great. Very good. I am very happy with this purchase！

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: This chair seemed to have consistent positive reviews, so I ordered it. It arrived safely packaged in protective bubble wrap and clear plastic. My desktop is 31 inches high so I wanted a chair that would rise a bit higher than my current. This chair does actually rise to 24 inches and works perfectly for me. The material feels like leather and the arm rests are soft with about 1/2" of padding. The lift mechanism is smooth and quiet. The chair is very comfortable to sit in! The first time I sat down, I noticed the lumbar support pressing firmly against my back. It was very noticeable but after using the chair for over two weeks, I finding it is very comfortable and I feel it promotes better posture. My old chair had a pronounced backward lean and I much prefer this new chair. I also appreciate that the arms fold up and out of the way when desired. Assembly took me about 30 minutes and the directions were excellent with well written instructions, detailed illustrations and a parts list. The parts were labeled in a sealed package. While this chair is indicated as "big and tall", I am 5'9" and weigh 185 lbs. and I wouldn't want it to be any smaller. I am very impressed by the quality of this chair and would highly recommend it. You won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Seems solid & well cushioned. Took A LOT of fiddling to get the bolts screwed into the back. Make sure to clear the extra material from around the holes first. As others have noted it lacks adjustments other than up & down. Supposedly you can adjust rocking tension, but I couldn't tell much difference.It has a good size seat. I can comfortably sit cross-legged. The material feels like it will hold up well. Overall I'm happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Right for the right person.
reviews.reviewText: If you have wide hips don't bother. The seat padding has no real support so the framework beneath the seat digs into my hips, not comfortable at all. Definitely not the chair for me. The chair looks nice and for a small/narrower person it might work ok. Not sure why it's being marketed to larger/heavier people. Very disappointing! I fully intend to return the chair. UPDATE: The company is willing to refund my money and I appreciate that, very much. As I said, for a narrow person this chair will probably work fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The chair is very sturdy and comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it, very comfortable. No tilt lock
reviews.reviewText: The black leather office chair I tried is incredibly comfortable and can support up to 400 pounds. It has a sleek and sophisticated look with its black leather upholstery. The padding on the seat and backrest provides great support for long hours of sitting. However, it doesn't have a tilt lock feature, which would have been a nice addition.Despite that, the chair's ergonomic design promotes good posture and reduces the risk of backaches. It can be easily adjusted to the desired height and has a 360-degree swivel feature for easy mobility. Overall, it's a durable and stylish chair that offers excellent comfort, although it lacks a tilt lock.
